name.label: Name
name.help: This is the new name that will be applied to shortcuts that do not already have this name.

description.label: Description
description.help: This is the description that will be set for the shortcut.

path.label: Path
path.help: This is the path where the icon will be applied.
path.rules:
• - You can use environment variables like ${APPDATA}.
  • - Use ${DESKTOP} for both user and public desktop paths.
  • - Wildcards like * and ? are supported.
  • - Character sets like [abc] are supported, allowing you to match any one of the characters listed (e.g., a, b, or c).
  • - Use multiple * for recursive folder searches: ** for 1 or fewer levels, *** for 2 or fewer levels, and so on.

destination.label: Destination
destination.help: This is the path that will be matched with destination paths of shortcuts in the source folder if the file is not found in the original path.

url.label: URL
url.help: This is the URL that will be matched with URLs of files in the source folder if the file is not found in the original path.

delete_pack.confirmation_title: Are you sure you want to delete this pack?

import_pack.confirmation_title: Do you want to import this pack?

message.version_format: Version must be in the format v1.0.0

corner_radius.label: Corner Radius
corner_radius.description: Change the corner radius of the icons in this pack.

opacity.label: Opacity
opacity.description: Change the opacity of the icons in this pack.

settings.restart_the_app_for_changes_to_take_effe: Restart the app for changes to take effect.
settings.are_you_sure_you_want_to_import_this_con: Are you sure you want to import this config?
settings.the_app_will_restart_to_load_the_new_con: The app will be restarted to load the new config.
settings.there_was_an_error_saving_the_config: There was an error saving the config.

theme.label: Theme
theme.description: Choose a color scheme for the interface.

window_opacity.label: Window Opacity
window_opacity.description: Adjust the window opacity. (This setting is ignored if 'None' is selected for window effect.)

use_system_title_bar.label: Use System Title Bar
use_system_title_bar.description: Use the default system title bar instead of a custom one.

log_levels.label: Log Levels
log_levels.description: Select the log levels to record.

max_log_files.label: Max Log Files
max_log_files.description: Set the maximum number of log files to retain.

import_export.label: Import/Export Settings
import_export.description: Import or export settings your settings from/to a JSON file.

save_window_status.label: Save Window Status
save_window_status.description: Save window size, position, and state.

match_lnk_by_destination.label: Match Windows Shortuts (.lnk) by Destination
match_lnk_by_destination.description: Match windows shortcuts by destination if matching by path is not successful.

match_url_by_destination.label: Match .url files by URL
match_url_by_destination.description: Match .url files by URL if matching by path is not successful.

rename_matched_files.label: Rename Matched Files
rename_matched_files.description: Rename matched files if the names does not match.

change_description_of_matched_lnk_files.label: Change Description of Matched Windows Shortcut (.lnk) Files
change_description_of_matched_lnk_files.description: Change the description of matched shortucts.

update.failed_to_check_for_updates: Failed to check for updates. Please try again later.
update.failed_to_download_update: Failed to download update. Please try again later.
update.need_admin_privileges: Administration privileges are needed to update the application.
